title: Amid anti-Taliban uprising, Taliban kill Afghan folk singer with whom they had tea before: Report
content:
1. Amid anti-Taliban uprising, Taliban kill Afghan folk singer with whom they had tea before: Report  Hindustan Times
  2. Afghan President Ashraf Ghani fled Kabul so quickly fearing execution by the Taliban that aides who returned from a lunch break wondered where he'd gone  Yahoo! Voices
  3. Kabul: Taliban 'special forces' patrol streets | AFP  AFP News Agency
  4. Inclusive govt to be formed within days: Mujahid  Pajhwok Afghan News
  5. Veteran Afghan strongmen to form new front for negotiating with Taliban  Reuters
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

Afghan President Ashraf Ghani fled Kabul so quickly fearing execution by the Taliban that aides who returned from a lunch break wondered where he'd gone  Yahoo! Voices

localize.title: 反タリバンの反乱の中、タリバンは以前にお茶をしたことのあるアフガンのフォークシンガーを殺害した。レポート
在反塔利班起义中，塔利班杀害了之前与他们喝过茶的阿富汗民谣歌手。报告
在反塔利班起義中，塔利班殺害了之前與他們喝過茶的阿富汗民謠歌手。報告
